ray.rage.rendersystem.shader

  • Classes in ray.rage.rendersystem.shader used by ray.rage.rendersystem 
    Class and Description
    GpuShaderProgram
    A GPU shader program represents the modern programmable graphics pipeline.
    GpuShaderProgram.Type
    Used to determine which program will be created.
  • Classes in ray.rage.rendersystem.shader used by ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4 
    Class and Description
    GpuShaderProgram
    A GPU shader program represents the modern programmable graphics pipeline.
    GpuShaderProgram.Type
    Used to determine which program will be created.
  • Classes in ray.rage.rendersystem.shader used by ray.rage.rendersystem.shader 
    Class and Description
    GpuShaderProgram
    A GPU shader program represents the modern programmable graphics pipeline.
    GpuShaderProgram.Context
    The context encapsulates all the objects whose information is needed by the program to execute properly.
    GpuShaderProgram.Input
    An input expected by the program from clients.
    GpuShaderProgram.LocatableInput
    A nameable input in the source code that is given a location ID at runtime by the underlying driver.
    GpuShaderProgram.Stage
    The stage within the graphics pipeline that source code will be added for.
    GpuShaderProgram.StorageBuffer
    A dynamic storage buffer for input data that receives a buffer ID at runtime by the underlying driver.
    GpuShaderProgram.Type
    Used to determine which program will be created.
  • Classes in ray.rage.rendersystem.shader used by ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl 
    Class and Description
    GpuShaderProgram
    A GPU shader program represents the modern programmable graphics pipeline.
    GpuShaderProgram.Attribute
    An input attribute.
    GpuShaderProgram.Context
    The context encapsulates all the objects whose information is needed by the program to execute properly.
    GpuShaderProgram.Input
    An input expected by the program from clients.
    GpuShaderProgram.LocatableInput
    A nameable input in the source code that is given a location ID at runtime by the underlying driver.
    GpuShaderProgram.Stage
    The stage within the graphics pipeline that source code will be added for.
    GpuShaderProgram.StorageBuffer
    A dynamic storage buffer for input data that receives a buffer ID at runtime by the underlying driver.
    GpuShaderProgram.Type
    Used to determine which program will be created.
    GpuShaderProgram.Uniform
    An input uniform.
    GpuShaderProgramFactory
    A factory that allows the creation of shader-programs.
